summary: The blind swordsman tries to locate a girl's missing father.
cast: Shintarô Katsu|Miwa Takada|Eiko Taki|Kichijirô Ueda|Daimaru|Mikijirô Hira|Tomosaburô Ii|Gen Kimura|Hajime Koshikawa|Akitake Kôno|Kôichi Mizuhara|Ikuko Môri|Raketsuto Nakata|Tokio Oki|Jotaro Senba|Yûsaku Terashima|Nakajirô Tomita|Teruko Ômi
title: Zatôichi sekisho yaburi
